channel.title: Distributed on S.P.A.M.
channel.description: Recent content in Distributed on S.P.A.M.

item.title: (Attempting to) Read Papers: Times, Clocks and Ordering of Events
item.description: DISCLAIMER: This is not a detailed explanation of the paper, but rather just my thoughts on it. So I’ve been trying to get started on reading CS papers with a mediocre amount of success. I started with the Byzantine Generals paper but that sort of melted my brain. It was a case of me going “Holy shit, I get it!” followed by “Goddamnit, I don’t get it” again and again before I threw it away.
